Package com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller

Class ButtonState

java.lang.Object
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.ButtonState
public class ButtonState extends Object
This class stores the state of the currently selected territory button state. The state should be modified by the editor tool buttons. If the TerritoryEventHandler does register a click, the eventHandler gets the current state from this class
Author:
Jonas Pohl
